channel.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
channel.description:
How you think you're gunna do? Revised much? How did you revise?
I've only really started revising two weeks ago, and mocks start next monday. Pretty damn nervous about them, if I'm honest. I don't think I've revised enough, and these mock results will be sent to my first place college. I'm guessing these are what the college is basing 'Should we give him an interview, or not' question on. Any tips for on the day?
Post any results here as well, that will be good to compare.
Goodluck whoever is taking them :)

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:17, topic:161041”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=219120.msg1922397#msg1922397 date=1197240808]
Damn, French oral tommorow, and then I can finally start relaxing…
[/quote]

Are the french teachers a bit hot?[/quote]

I meant once it is over, I can start relaxing and getting in to the Christmas spirit

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I’m in Year ten so next year for me. I have never revised yet i got an A on mock science tests (It was fucking gay, I had to do three tests because I do triple science) I’m not too bothered about it, I’m predicted A-A* in all my subjects so I guess if I put some effort into it I’ll get it. In our class things they give us our current grades, I’m a B in Maths and a C in Science already and I only just started my GCSE years :S.

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

GCSEs are easy as hell, I didn’t revise for the mocks, and i did about 2-10 hours revision for all my real ones (Dependant on subject). That’s brutal honesty. A-Levels however are a massive step-up, Good Luck all the same <3

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Lol…had maths today. Piss easy…

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

fellixombc:

Most colleges look at your SAT’s scores or your ACT’s scores.

Don’t talk about what you don’t know. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/General_Certificate_of_Secondary_Education

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:6, topic:161041”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=219120.msg1902694#msg1902694 date=1196228661]
The GCSE’s are like the American SAT’s right? and so is the mock one the practice one?
[/quote]

I believe the GCSE’s actually test what you learn in school. SAT’s test basically nothing relevant to high school or college. Not entirely sure, because I live in NJ.[/quote]
Most colleges look at your SAT’s scores or your ACT’s scores.

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Good luck, this time next year I’ll be in the same posisition as you.

Whoa, didn’t realise you were in year 10. I’ll give you a bit of advice, don’t leave revision to the last two weeks before they start. You will already be loaded down with coursework.

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i did my GCSE’s last year,
lol i love looking at you guys, with your pathetic little dreams

trust me, GCSE’s will be a load of crap compaired to A-Levels, the jump is so huge your wont belive it

Read full topic

item.title: So..GCSE Mocks are starting
item.dc:creator: @formidable formidable
item.description:
@formidable wrote:

I also start my mocks in January, although I done C1a and C1b in science.
Which is chemistry for all you retards
I found it really hard, but whenever I find a test hard, I usually do really good in it.

Well good luck to you, hopefully I will get teh predicted A* in maths ;D

Read full topic

I don’t take mocks until january =D
but i’d really rather take them now.
Susie is taking hers this week though.

Good luck!
